thread.title: Sky Dealbreakers
thread.title_full: VIP Communications reviewed by Sky Dealbreakers

author: Sky Dealbreakers
title: Sky Dealbreakers
text: VIP is a great alternative when the networks(internet) are not working in other countries outside the USA and you need to get in contact with someone. The rates are the cheapest I've found and the lines work better using VIP instead of calling cards.
